pr_title: Temporary fix for challenged TCK test

timeline.message:
Temporary fix for challenged TCK test

This is to pass the current TCK.  This has been challenged in https://github.com/eclipse-ee4j/jakartaee-tck/issues/585

timeline.bodyText:
Do we really want to fall through to use the target mapping if this is null.
Should we skip the null check here and return (ServletPathMapping)async always.
timeline.author: lachlan-roberts

replies.bodyText: I think it is a mute point as the async mapping should never be null when the dispatch type is ASYNC... however, just in case  I would prefer to return non null.
replies.author: gregw
